rule.ruleDesc: call js to save context and seperate it to save to table with value
rule.fullDesc: call js to save context and seperate it to save to table with value
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var result=lib.c.$(\"#taskPlannerService\").parseForm(system.vars.$tempOutput, record,\"savetask\")\u000asystem.vars.$L_ret=result.getValue();\u000a\u000aif(result.getValue() === \"1\")\u000a{\u000a var parent = result.getDocumentElement();\u000a var node = parent.getFirstChildElement();\u000a returnCode = 1; \u000a message=node.getValue();\u000a msgType=\"screen\";\u000a cursorPosition = \"active\";\u000a}"}
